sentences.text: Other Benefits
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Perquisites are not a significant element of our executive compensation program.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not reimburse our NEOs for club  memberships or provide tax gross-up payments (other than for Mr. Feeser, pursuant to the terms of an employment agreement we  assumed in connection with the Combination, and for Mr. Porter with respect to his automobile allowance).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have reimbursed  Mr. Porter with respect to his automobile allowance and life insurance payments; however, as of January 1, 2016, we no longer  reimburse him for life insurance payments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain perquisites are provided that enable our NEOs to perform their responsibilities  more efficiently.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, Messrs. Voorhees and Porter may use our airplanes for business and limited personal use.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This  perquisite helps keep them more secure, ensures their quick availability for Company matters and permits them to work on  Company business without distractions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that the benefit to us of providing this perquisite outweighs the costs to the  Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: OTHER COMPENSATION PRACTICES AND POLICIES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Officer Stock Ownership and Retention Requirements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain of our executives, including our NEOs, are expected to meet or exceed specified levels of Common Stock ownership in order to align their interests with those of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has established the following ownership guidelines:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Position Target Ownership Chief Executive Officer 6 times base salary Other Designated Executives 3 times base salary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In determining compliance with these guidelines, stock ownership includes shares vested and unvested restricted stock awards.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executives have five years from the date of their designation to achieve the targeted level of ownership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our NEOs who  continue to be employed by us have achieved the targeted level of ownership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain of our executives, including our NEOs, are required to retain 50% of the net restricted stock awarded to the individual for  a period of two years following the vesting of the restricted stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The retention period does not apply to any shares to the extent  the recipient continues to own an amount of Common Stock at least equal to the amount of shares required under the preceding  sentence, plus an amount of shares required to be held under our stock ownership guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Anti-Hedging/Anti-Pledging Policy
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We adopted a policy in 2016 that prohibits our directors and officers who are subject to the reporting requirements of Section 16  of the Exchange Act, members of our leadership team and other designated employees from
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) holding Common Stock in margin  accounts,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) pledging Common Stock as collateral for a loan,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) trading in options, warrants, puts, calls or similar instruments on  our Common Stock or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) short selling Common Stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Clawback Provisions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has adopted clawback provisions that apply to awards made to our NEOs pursuant to our annual  executive bonus program and incentive stock plans that allow us to recapture amounts paid or stock granted to NEOs that vests  based upon financial results that we are required to restate at a future date if the Compensation Committee determines that the  restatement is based in whole or in part upon any misconduct by an applicable NEO.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These provisions require an applicable NEO  to pay us an amount of cash or deliver an amount of shares of Common Stock equal to the benefit received by the NEO because  of the misstatement of financial results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These provisions apply to misstatements of financial results that are discovered within 24  months after an applicable stock grant has vested or bonus has been paid.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee may adopt changes to  the clawback provisions once the SEC issues final rules and the NYSE adopts related listing standards implementing the provisions of the Dodd-Frank Act related to compensation recovery.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deductibility of Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has reviewed the applicability of Section 162(m) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986, as amended (the Code).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In certain circumstances, Section 162(m) may deny a federal income tax deduction for compensation to our NEOs  (excluding our CFO) in excess of $1 million per year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain compensation that qualifies as performance-based and is paid  pursuant to a plan that has been approved by stockholders may be exempt from the Section 162(m) limit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annual and long- term incentive plans have been structured with the intent of enabling the Compensation Committee to grant compensation  that constitutes qualified performance-based compensation under Section 162(m), if the Compensation Committee  determines to do so.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, we believe that our interests and our stockholders interests may sometimes be best served by  providing compensation that is not deductible in order to attract, retain, motivate and reward executive talent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, the  Compensation Committee intends to retain the flexibility to provide for payments of compensation that are not deductible.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employment Agreements and Change in Control Agreements
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Porter
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We entered into an employment agreement with Mr. Porter in 2015 that superseded an employment agreement  with him that we assumed in connection with our acquisition of Southern Container Corp. in 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon Mr. Porters  termination for any reason other than for cause (as defined in the agreement), he will be entitled to continue to  receive compensation and benefits through the termination date and to receive the following benefits:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: outstanding unvested stock options, if any, will vest and become exercisable;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: provided any applicable performance goals under outstanding unvested long-term incentive awards (other  than stock options) are satisfied, awards granted in any calendar year prior to the calendar year in which his  employment terminates will vest, and he will be vested in a prorated portion of any awards granted in the  calendar year in which his employment terminates;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) an amount equal to 12 months of his base salary and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) any bonus he would have been entitled to with  respect to the 12-month period; provided the amount and duration of severance and bonus set forth in
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) will be reduced by multiplying the amounts by a fraction, the numerator of which will be the total number of  days remaining between the termination date and December 31, 2016, and the denominator of which will be  366.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If Mr. Porter resigns or voluntarily terminates employment with us, he will be entitled to the vesting of his outstanding  unvested stock options and long-term incentive awards as described above but not to any other benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If we  terminate Mr. Porters employment at any time for cause, he will only be entitled to continue to receive compensation  and benefits through the termination date, and he will not be entitled to any other compensation or benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Porters employment agreement includes a non-compete provision that is applicable for two years following  termination and a non-solicitation provision that is applicable for three years following termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Feeser
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We assumed an employment agreement with Mr. Feeser in connection with the Combination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because the  Combination constituted a change in control under the agreement, Mr. Feeser would be entitled to continue to  receive compensation and benefits through the termination date and to receive the following severance benefits if  we terminate him other than for cause or disability before July 1, 2017:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a lump sum amount equal to two times  his base salary, plus the average annual incentive compensation paid over the three years before the effective date  (as defined in the agreement),
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a prorated bonus for the year of his termination,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) a lump sum payment in lieu of  health care continuation coverage for a period of two years,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) payment for outplacement services and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) a lump  sum payment representing the qualified and non-qualified pension accruals as if he had worked an additional three  years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The agreement also entitles Mr. Feeser to receive an additional payment in the event that any payment is subject to excise tax (as defined in the agreement), such that after payment by him of all taxes and the excise tax he will
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: retain an amount of the additional payment equal to the excise tax imposed on the payments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recently amended  Mr. Feesers employment agreement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In consideration for him terminating his right to claim termination for good  cause (as defined in the agreement) we agreed to provide him with up to three years of additional pension accrual  for age and service under the Pension Plan (as defined in Compensation Matters  Executive Compensation Tables   Retirement Plans  WestRock Company Consolidated Pension Plan) and Retirement Restoration Plan (as defined  in Compensation Matters  Executive Compensation Tables  Retirement Plans  MWV Retirement Restoration Plan  and MWV Executive Retirement Plan) depending on his date of retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If he retires before July 2, 2017 or after  December 31, 2020, he will not receive any additional pension accrual.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Chalovich
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We assumed an employment agreement with Mr. Chalovich in connection with our acquisition of Southern Container  Corp. in 2008.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the agreement, if we terminate Mr. Chalovich without gross cause (as defined in the  agreement), he will be entitled to continue to receive compensation and benefits through the termination date and to  receive salary and paid COBRA continuation for one year, as well as a pro-rated bonus.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Beckler
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2016, we were party to a change in control agreement with Mr. Beckler that he had entered into with  MeadWestvaco prior to the Combination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The agreement provided for continued employment for two years after  a change in control on terms substantially similar to those in effect before the change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Becklers  employment with us terminated in July 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Because the Combination constituted a change in control under the  agreement, Mr. Beckler received the following severance benefits:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) a lump sum amount equal to two times his  base salary, plus the average annual incentive compensation paid over the three years before the effective date of  the Combination,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) a prorated bonus for the year of his termination,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) a lump sum payment in lieu of health care  continuation coverage for a period of two years,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) payment for outplacement services and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) a lump sum payment  representing the qualified and non-qualified pension accruals as if he had worked an additional three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In  addition, the Compensation Committee determined to treat Mr. Becklers 2016 performance-based stock grant as if his  employment will continue through the end of the vesting period associated with the grant, rather than require forfeiture of the award.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Beckler is party to a restrictive covenant agreement he entered into with MeadWestvaco that requires  him to protect our confidential information, property and trade secrets, and prohibits him from competing with us or  soliciting our employees or our customers for 12 months following his termination of employment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (B) In accordance with SEC regulations, we report the use of corporate aircraft by our executive officers as a perquisite or other personal benefit unless it is integrally and  directly related to the performance of the executives duties.

sentences.text: SEC rules require us to report this and other perquisites at our aggregate incremental cost.

sentences.text: We estimate  our aggregate incremental cost to be equal to our average incremental operating costs, which includes items such as fuel; maintenance; landing fees; trip-related  permits; trip-related hangar costs; trip-related meals and supplies; crew expenses during layovers; and any other expenses incurred or accrued based on the number  of hours flown.

sentences.text: RETIREMENT PLANS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: WestRock Company Consolidated Pension Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective July 2, 2015, the RockTenn Pension Plan and MWV Pension Plan merged into the WestRock Company Consolidated  Pension Plan (the Pension Plan).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Voorhees participated in the legacy RockTenn portion of the Pension Plans defined benefit  plan for former RockTenn salaried and nonunion hourly employees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We refer to the Pension Plan as it applies to former RockTenn  employees as the RockTenn Pension Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee determined that there would be no future pension  accruals under the RockTenn Pension Plan for any salaried or nonunion hourly participant after December 31, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Voorhees will receive a benefit at retirement equal to the sum of (1) the benefit accrued from the date of hire through February  28, 2005, under the benefit formula in effect during that period, and (2) the benefit accrued under the 2005 benefit formula  between March 1, 2005 and December 31, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Pension Plan is a defined benefit plan qualified under the Code and, as such, is subject to a limitation under the Code on the  amount of benefits that may be paid to a participant each year under the plan as described below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MWV Pension Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Messrs. Feeser and Beckler participated in the legacy MWV portion of the Pension Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We refer to the Pension Plan as it applies to former MeadWestvaco employees as the MWV Pension Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MWV Pension Plan is a qualified retirement plan that covered all salaried employees of the Company who were employees of MeadWestvaco before the Combination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective January 1, 2015, MeadWestvaco added a supplemental cash balance benefit to the MWV Pension Plan (the Retirement  Plus Benefit) for all salaried employees, which was funded by Company contributions equal to 4% of each participants eligible  compensation, which contributions are made in lieu of contributions to the participants 401(k) plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Retirement Plus Benefit  terminated effective December 31, 2015 for all participants of the MWV Pension Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee determined that there would be no further pension accruals under other components of the MWV  Pension Plan for salaried and nonunion hourly employees after December 31, 2015, unless, on December 31, 2015, a participant is  at least age 50 years old and the sum of his or her age and service equal at least 75, in which case pension benefits under the MWV  Pension Plan will continue to accrue for 5 additional years to December 31, 2020, or earlier upon such participants termination of  employment with the Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Feeser qualifies for this additional accrual period under the MWV Pension Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, due  to adjustments required to pass non-discrimination testing, Mr. Feeser ceased to accrue benefits under the WestRock qualified  plan as of September 30, 2016 but will continue to accrue a benefit under the MWV Restoration Plan until December 31, 2020, or  his termination, if earlier.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Beckler ceased accruing pension benefits under the MWV Pension Plan upon his retirement on July 5,  2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No employees compensation for purposes of the Pension Plan includes amounts in excess of the compensation limit under the  Code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This limit is periodically adjusted for inflation by the United States Secretary of the Treasury and this limit, as adjusted, was  $255,000 for calendar year 2013, was $260,000 for calendar year 2014, was $265,000 for 2015 and will be $265,000 for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SERP
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Supplemental Executive Retirement Plan (the SERP) was designed to supplement a participants benefit under the RockTenn  Pension Plan for a relatively small number of participants.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SERP provides unfunded supplemental retirement benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The SERP benefit is paid in a lump sum to participants whose employment with the Company is terminated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee  had determined who participated in the SERP and the benefit level for such participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Nine active employees participated in the  SERP , including Mr. Voorhees, who is the only currently employed NEO who participated in the SERP .
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Two benefit levels were in use during fiscal 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Benefit level 2 is based on a participants base salary and bonus paid.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Voorhees  participates in the SERP at benefit level 2.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No benefit will be paid to a participant if he or she is not eligible for a vested benefit under  the RockTenn Pension Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No additional benefits accrue under the SERP after December 31, 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: MWV Retirement Restoration Plan and MWV Executive Retirement Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Feeser participates in a non-qualified retirement restoration plan (the Retirement Restoration Plan) that mirrors the benefits  provided under the MWV Pension Plan following the same formulas but recognizing compensation in excess of the limits set forth  under the Code limit as described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Benefits under this plan attributable to the Final Average Pay Benefit are payable in a  lump sum option and annuity form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The lump sum option is only available for those benefits that were earned under the Legacy  Mead Lump-Sum Eligible Benefit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Legacy Mead Lump-Sum Eligible Benefit was frozen December 31, 2002.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Consistent with  the qualified plan, there have been no, and will be no, further accruals after December 31, 2015, unless, as above noted above, on  December 31, 2015, a participant had turned at least age 50 and the sum of his or her age and service had equaled at least 75.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr.  Feeser qualifies for this additional accrual period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Becklers benefits under this plan which are attributable to the Final Average  Pay Benefit are payable only as an annuity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Benefits under this plan attributable to the Retirement Plus Benefit are payable in lump  sum form only.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Feeser also participated in the MWV Executive Retirement Plan (MERP), a non-qualified supplemental executive retirement  plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The MERP follows the benefit formula and vesting schedule under the Companys qualified retirement plan described above, but recognizes additional service equal to .75 year of credited service for each year of actual service completed up to a maximum  number of years equal to his age at hire minus 30.

sentences.text: Generally, plan benefits are payable in annuity form and are subject to reduction for early retirement.

sentences.text: What am I voting on?

sentences.text: The Board is asking our stockholders to ratify the Audit Committees selection of Ernst & Young LLP as  our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting Recommendation: FOR the ratification of our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Required: An affirmative vote requires the majority of shares present in person or represented by proxy and entitled to  vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: REPORT OF THE AUDIT COMMITTEE
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is comprised of seven independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that all Audit Committee members are financially literate within the meaning of the NYSE Standards and that each of Ms. Martore and Messrs. Bernlohr, Crews,  Nevels and Powers qualifies as an audit committee financial expert within the meaning of SEC regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee met eight times during fiscal 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These meetings included periodic executive sessions with our  independent registered public accounting firm, our internal auditor and management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: During fiscal 2016, the Audit Committee  was updated no less than quarterly on managements process to assess the adequacy of our system of internal control over financial  reporting, the framework used to make the assessment and managements conclusions on the effectiveness of our internal control  over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee oversees our financial reporting process on behalf of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management has primary responsibility  for establishing and maintaining adequate internal financial controls, for preparing the financial statements and for the public  reporting process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ernst & Young LLP , our independent registered public accounting firm for fiscal 2016, is responsible for  expressing opinions that
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) our consolidated financial statements present fairly, in all material respects, the financial position,  results of operations and cash flows in conformity with generally accepted accounting principles and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) we maintained, in all  material respects, effective internal control over financial reporting as of September 30, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this context, the Audit Committee has:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: reviewed and discussed the audited financial statements for the year ended September 30, 2016 with management
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: discussed with the independent auditors those matters required to be discussed by the auditors with the Audit Committee under the rules adopted by the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (PCAOB) and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: received the written disclosures and the letter from the independent auditors required by applicable requirements of the  PCAOB regarding the independent auditors communication with the Audit Committee concerning independence and has discussed with the independent auditor its independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the reviews and discussion described in this report, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board (and the Board  approved) that the audited financial statements be included in the annual report on Form 10-K for the fiscal year ended September  30, 2016 for filing with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table presents (in thousands of dollars) the aggregate fees billed in each of the last two fiscal years for professional  services rendered by our independent registered public accounting firm, Ernst & Young LLP , and its affiliates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 ($)(4) 2015 ($)(4) Audit fees(1)  10,706 11,102 Audit-related fees(2)  681 350 Tax fees(3)  6,249 2,511  All other fees    Total fees paid to auditor  17,636 13,963
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1)  Audit fees consist primarily of fees related to professional services rendered for the audit of our annual financial statements included in our Form 10-K and the review of interim financial statements included in our quarterly reports on Form 10-Q,  accounting consultations to the extent necessary for Ernst & Young to fulfill its responsibility under generally accepted  auditing standards, as well as services in connection with other statutory and regulatory filings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2)  Audit-related fees consist of fees related to professional services rendered for assurance and related services that are  reasonably related to the performance of the audit or review of our annual financial statements that are not included in  the amounts disclosed as audit fees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For fiscal 2016, these fees primarily related to audit services provided for certain  carve-out audits, audits required under joint venture agreements and due diligence services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For fiscal 2015, these fees  primarily related to due diligence services and audits of employee benefit plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3)  Tax fees consist primarily of fees related to professional services rendered for tax compliance, tax advice and transfer pricing services, as well as tax fees incurred in connection with the spin-off of our specialty chemicals business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (4)  All such audit fees, audit-related fees and tax fees were pre-approved by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PRE-APPROVAL POLICIES AND PROCEDURES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has established a policy requiring pre-approval of audit and permissible audit-related and non-audit services  to be provided by the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following services have been pre-approved pursuant to  the policy:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: work associated with registered or unregistered securities offerings;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: assistance and consultation as to questions from us, including  comments or inquiries made by the SEC or other regulatory  bodies;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: statutory audits, employee benefit plan audits or other financial  audit work required for non-U.S. subsidiaries that is not required  for the audit under the Exchange Act;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: access to EY's internet-based accounting and reporting  resources;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: attest services;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: assistance with understanding our internal control review and  reporting obligations;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: advice and consultation as to proposed or newly adopted  accounting and auditing standards and interpretations, and as  to financial accounting and disclosure requirements imposed by the SEC, FASB and other regulatory agencies and professional  standard setting bodies;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: review of information systems security and controls;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: preparation and/or review of tax returns and related tax services;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: international tax planning; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: general federal, state and international tax planning and advice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All other audit, audit-related and non-audit services must be specifically pre-approved by the Audit Committee or its Chairman.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Engagements for our annual audit and quarterly reviews required under the Exchange Act are pre-approved annually, and the  nature and dollar value of these services are periodically reviewed with the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent registered public accounting firm and management report to the Audit Committee periodically regarding the  services rendered by, and actual fees paid to, the independent registered public accounting firm to ensure that the services are  within the limits approved by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ANNUAL REPORT ON FORM 10-K
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will provide without charge, at the written request of any stockholder of record as of the record date, a copy of our annual  report on Form 10-K, including the financial statements and financial statement schedule, as filed with the SEC, excluding exhibits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Requests for copies of our Form 10-K should be mailed to: WestRock Company, 504 Thrasher Street, Norcross, Georgia 30071,  Attention: Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also access a copy of our annual report at www.westrock.com.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: STOCKHOLDER PROPOSALS OR DIRECTOR NOMINATIONS FOR 2018 ANNUAL MEETING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: SEC rules permit stockholders to submit proposals for inclusion in our Proxy Statement and form of proxy if the stockholder and  the proposal meet the requirements specified in Rule 14a-8 under the Exchange Act.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To be considered for inclusion in next years  Proxy Statement, a stockholder proposal submitted in accordance with Rule 14a-8 must be received by us at our principal executive  offices by no later than August 18, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Bylaws provide that any stockholder proposal, including director nominations, that is not submitted for inclusion in next years  Proxy Statement under Rule 14a-8, but is instead sought to be presented directly at next years annual meeting of stockholders  must be delivered to our principal executive offices not later than the close of business on the 90th day nor earlier than the close  of business on the 120th day prior to the first anniversary of the preceding years annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In each case, the notice must  include the information specified in our Bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the 2018 annual meeting is held more than 30 days before or more than 60 days  after the anniversary date of the Annual Meeting, notice must be delivered not earlier than the close of business on the 120th day  prior to such annual meeting and not later than the close of business on the later of the 90th day prior to such annual meeting or the seventh day following the day on which public announcement of the date of such meeting is first made by us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, to submit any such proposal, stockholders must submit the required notice no earlier than the close of business on September 29, 2017 and  no later than the close of business on October 29, 2017, except as described above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The mailing address of our principal executive offices is 501 South 5th Street, Richmond, Virginia 23219.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals should be addressed to the attention of the Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS REGARDING THE ANNUAL MEETING AND VOTING
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When and where is the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Annual Meeting will be held at 9:00 a.m. (local time) at the Westin Atlanta Perimeter North hotel located at 7 Concourse Parkway, Atlanta, Georgia 30328.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the purpose of the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders will vote at the Annual Meeting on the matters summarized in this Proxy Statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why am I receiving these proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You received these proxy materials because you are a Company stockholder and the Board is soliciting your proxy to vote your  shares at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This Proxy Statement includes information that we are required to provide you under SEC rules and is  designed to assist you in voting your shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is included in these proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is a Proxy Statement and what is a proxy?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy materials for the Annual Meeting include the Notice of Annual Meeting, this Proxy Statement and our annual report.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you received a paper copy of these materials, the proxy materials also include a proxy card or voting instruction form.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A Proxy  Statement is a document that SEC regulations require us to give you when we ask you to sign a proxy designating individuals to  vote on your behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proxy is your legal designation of another person to vote your shares, and that other person is called a proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you  designate someone as your proxy in a written document, that document is also called a proxy or a proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have designated Mr.  Voorhees and Mr. Robert B. McIntosh, our General Counsel and Corporate Secretary, as proxies for the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What does it mean if I receive more than one notice, proxy materials email or proxy card
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It means you have multiple accounts with brokers and/or our transfer agent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need to vote separately with respect to each  notice, proxy materials email or proxy card you receive.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Why did I receive a one-page notice in the mail regarding the Internet availability of proxy materials instead of a full  set of proxy materials?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Instead of mailing a printed copy of the proxy materials to each stockholder of record, the SEC permits us to furnish proxy materials  by providing access to those documents on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders will not receive printed copies of the proxy materials unless  they request them.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The notice instructs you as to how to submit your proxy on the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you would like to receive a paper or  email copy of the proxy materials, you should follow the instructions in the notice for requesting those materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who may vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote if you owned Common Stock as of the close of business on December 2, 2016, the record date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How may I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by any of the following methods
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Internet  follow the instructions on your notice, proxy and/or voting instruction card or email notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Phone  follow the instructions on your notice, proxy and/or voting instruction card or email notice.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mail  complete sign and return the proxy and/or voting instruction card provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In Person  all registered stockholders may vote in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial holders may also vote in  person at the Annual Meeting if they have a legal proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When voting on proposals other than Proposal #3, you may vote for or against the item or you may abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When  voting on Proposal #3, you may vote for every 1 year, 2 years, 3 years or you may abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are not entitled to  appraisal or dissenters rights for any matter being voted on at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Can I change my vote or revoke my proxy after I vote?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may change your vote at any time before the polls close at the Annual Meeting by:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: voting again by telephone or over the Internet prior to 11:59 p.m., E.T., on January 26, 2017,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: giving written notice to our Corporate Secretary,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: delivering a later-dated proxy or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: voting in person at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may also revoke your proxy before it is voted at the Annual Meeting by using one of the methods listed above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many votes am I entitled to?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are entitled to one vote for each share of Common Stock you own.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What constitutes a quorum at the Annual Meeting, and why is a quorum required?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The presence at the Annual Meeting, in person or by proxy, of the holders of a majority of the shares entitled to vote on the record  date will constitute a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum of stockholders is necessary to hold a valid meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How many shares of Common Stock were outstanding on the record date?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What vote is required to approve each proposal?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal Vote Required Abstentions Broker  Non-Votes Allowed
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. Election of Directors Majority of votes cast No effect No  2. Say on Pay Majority of shares present in person or represented  by proxy and entitled to vote Vote against No
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Say on Pay Frequency The option of every 1 year, 2 years or 3 years  that receives the highest number of affirmative  votes by those shares present in person or  represented by proxy entitled to vote Vote against No
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. Ratification of Auditor Majority of shares present in person or represented  by proxy and entitled to vote Vote against Yes
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Will any other business be conducted at the Annual Meeting?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is not aware of any items, other than those referred to in this Proxy Statement, that may properly come before the  Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is the difference between holding shares as a registered holder and as a beneficial holder?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These terms describe the manner in which your shares are held.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered directly in your name with our transfer  agent, you are a registered holder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are held in the name of a bank, brokerage or other nominee as custodian on your  behalf, you are a beneficial holder.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What if I am a beneficial holder and do not give voting instructions to my broker?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a beneficial holder, in order to ensure your shares are voted in the way you would like, you must provide voting instructions to  your bank, broker or other nominee by the deadline provided in the materials you receive from your bank, broker or other nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you do not provide voting instructions to your bank, broker or other nominee, whether your shares can be voted by such person  depends on the type of item being considered for vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposals #1, #2 and #3 are non-discretionary items and may not be voted  on by brokers, banks or other nominees who have not received specific voting instructions from beneficial holders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal #4 is  a discretionary item.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, banks, brokers and other nominees that do not receive voting instructions from beneficial holders  may vote on this proposal in their discretion.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: What is householding?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Beneficial holders who share a single address may receive only one copy of the notice or the proxy materials, as the case may be,  unless their broker, bank or other nominee has received contrary instructions from any beneficial holder at that address.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is  known as householding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If any beneficial holder(s) sharing a single address wishes to discontinue householding and/or receive a  separate copy of the notice or the proxy materials, as the case may be, or wish to enroll in householding, they should contact their  broker, bank or other nominee directly.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Alternatively, if any such beneficial holders wishes to receive a separate copy of the proxy  materials, we will deliver them promptly upon written request to WestRock Company, 504 Thrasher Street, Norcross, Georgia  30071, Attention: Corporate Secretary.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When will the Company announce the voting results?
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will announce preliminary voting results at the Annual Meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We will report the final results on our website and in a current report on Form 8-K filed with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PLEASE RECYCL
sentences.label: UNKNOWN
